title: U.S. Power Outage Analysis
description: Power outage analysis using data from continental U.S. from January 2000 to July 2016.

title: Weather's Effect on Perceived Sickness in SD
description: Exploratory visualization of the relationship between weather and perceived sickness in San Diego using weather data and Google Trends.

title: Understanding Heart Rate Variability Over Time of Day
description: Used BIG IDEAs Lab Glycemic Variability and Wearable Device Data to map heart rate variability over time of day across gender.

title: Bikewatching Map.
description: Interactive map to visualize traffic of bikes in the Boston area. Created using Mapbox and D3.

title: Visualizing Mice Temperature Data Across Gender
description: Interactive exploratory visualization of mice health data, comparing male and female mice. Created using D3.
